issue.title: [C++] Add static constructor for FileOutputStream returning shared_ptr to base OutputStream
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2184](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2184). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be useful for most IO ctors to return pointers to the base interface that they implement rather than the subclass. Whether we deprecate the current ones will vary on a case by case basis

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2184?focusedCommentId=16371963) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
